Title: Relates to providing broadband and fiber optic services
Summary: Relates to providing broadband and fiber optic services; requires the public service commission to determine the status of broadband and fiber optic services in New York state; provides that the commission shall require construction or installation of broadband and fiber optic services by an internet service provider in communities in which broadband and fiber optic services are determined to be absent, insufficient, or inadequate.
LawCode: Add ยง224-c, amd Art 11 Head & ยง212, Pub Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public service law, in relation to providing broadband and fiber optic services
